data.title: 2 High Schoolers'  Dream - TravelExchange Web and Mobile App by Gina Ni  & Gia Ni (Tony Ni facilitating) — Kickstarter
data.name: Gina Ni  & Gia Ni (Tony Ni facilitating)
data.description: A free website and mobile App matches 2 travelers with each other’s local towns as the destination and take turns to host each other.

data.title: CulSire  (Kul-Sire) ~ Where Culture Meets Desire by LaNée Javet — Kickstarter
data.name: LaNée Javet
data.description: An explosion of Urban Lifestyle! We ARE THE HUB for connecting you to  Businesses, Resources, Services, TV & Technology across America

data.title: Act Natural - Web App by Daniel Ebel — Kickstarter
data.name: Daniel Ebel
data.description: A civic app to help people find Chicago parks with natural areas in order to enjoy nature in the city. Over 60 venues are featured.

data.title: Infoactive - Drop live data into interactive infographics by Trina Chiasson — Kickstarter
data.name: Trina Chiasson
data.description: Create mobile-friendly, dynamic infographics. Transform data into beautiful stories to analyze and explore.
